be.ac.ulb.infof307.g09.database

Class TaskDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.ac.ulb.infof307.g09.database.Database
      • be.ac.ulb.infof307.g09.database.TaskDatabase

  • public final class TaskDatabase
extends Database
    The class is used to handle CRUD actions with the Task table.

      • createTask

        public Task createTask(java.lang.String description,
                       java.lang.Long startDate,
                       java.lang.Long endDate,
                       int projectId)
                throws DatabaseException,
                       ConnectionFailedException
        Add task to the Task database with a a start and end date.
        Parameters:
        description - task content
        startDate - beginning date of the task
        endDate - ending date of the task
        projectId - id of project
        Returns:
        new created task
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - when something wrong happens during a database transaction
        ConnectionFailedException - If the connection to the database fails

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Update the task from database.
        Parameters:
        task - the task
        newDescription - new description of task
        startDate - first day of the task
        endDate - last day of the task
